  Item 8.01. Other Events.                                      
                                                                
On March 17, 2025, Wells Fargo & Company (the “Company”) issued
a news release announcing that its 2021 consent order with the
Office of the Comptroller of the Currency related to loss
mitigation practices in the Company’s Home Lending business had
terminated.

A copy of the news release is included as Exhibit 99.1 to this
report and is incorporated by reference into this Item 8.01.
